commentMessage: I find this tutorial very interesting. may I have it for print? Just to take notes.
Thank you for this tutorial, Kim, it is very useful. I have a question: how do I get my data to be like Table 33? Thanks!

Gal Podjarny, the following link will answer your question. https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/data.table/vignettes/datatable-reshape.html

I am afraid you need to step into data.table world! Welcome :)

I find standard R function  reshape more intuitive. This has nice example :

https://www.statistician-online.com/1-data-management/reshaping-data-into-wide-or-long-format-in-r/
